entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
